divs: sighting detailsim not the witness im a referral im not sure if this woman has been in contact with you guys so i feel obligated to report this womans video footage from may 09' up till recent days..at http:\\www.youtube.com\user\seeingufospa she has over 60 videos of incredible up close footage of morphing triangular crafts with lights, spheres or orbs and i felt since this is an ongoing scenario, perhaps an investigation or interview could be fascilitated for the show or whatnot.. exact locations are given on her page. she has stills and lengthy footage it is a must inlook. ty. please respond unto further action.
